original_text: On the thirteenth day of the month Adar; and on the fourteenth day of the same rested they, and made it a day of feasting and gladness.
korean_text: 아달월 십삼일에 그 일을 행하였고 십사일에 쉬며 그 날에 잔치를 베풀어 즐겼고

sentences.original_text: On the thirteenth day of the month Adar
and on the fourteenth day of the same
and made it a day of feasting and gladness
